com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy

Interface PolicyFinder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StdPolicyFinder

    public interface PolicyFinder
    PolicyFinder is the interface for objects that can locate XACML Policies and PolicySets by identifier and contains the root Policy or Policy set. The interface is designed to allow for finders that can retrieve a root policy from a repository based on matching a Request.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    car

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PolicyFinderResult<Policy> getPolicy(IdReferenceMatch idReferenceMatch)
      Gets the Policy that matches the given IdReferenceMatch.
      PolicyFinderResult<PolicySet> getPolicySet(IdReferenceMatch idReferenceMatch)
      Gets the PolicySet that matches the given IdReferenceMatch.
      PolicyFinderResult<PolicyDef> getRootPolicyDef(EvaluationContext evaluationContext)
      Gets the root PolicyDef from the policy store configured by the particular implementation of the PolicyFinderFactory class that is applicable to the Request in the given EvaluationContext.

    • Method Detail

      • getRootPolicyDef

        PolicyFinderResult<PolicyDef> getRootPolicyDef(EvaluationContext evaluationContext)
        Gets the root PolicyDef from the policy store configured by the particular implementation of the PolicyFinderFactory class that is applicable to the Request in the given EvaluationContext.
        Returns:
        a PolicyFinderResult with the root PolicyDef

        Returns:

        Returns:
